title: # 444 - Jamie Kilstein & ME
description:
Today I sit down with stand up comedian Jamie Kilstein. We talk about our favorite bands, moving to Texas, diets, eating disorders, mental health, Winston Churchill, Pro Wrestling, and much more! 

 

Check out Jamie’s stand up special “25% Capacity” on iTunes or Amazon today!

 

This episode is brought to you by Hims. Go to http://www.forhims.com/bertcast for your free visit

 

This episode is also brought to you by Lucy. Go to http://www.lucy.co and use Promo Code BERT to get 20% off all products, including gum or lozenges!

 

For all TOUR DATE & MERCH click HERE: http://www.bertbertbert.com 

Twitter: http://www.Twitter.com/bertkreischer 

Facebook: http://www.Facebook.com/BertKreischer 

Instagram: http://www.Instagram.com/bertkreischer 

Youtube: http://www.Youtube.com/user/Akreischer
